name: Infinite Chrome Flakes Multichrome Gel for Eyes & Face
about: What it is:An innovative, self-setting, water-based gel formula with suspended multicolored, multi-chrome flakes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The easy-to-use, multi-chrome flake formula requires no mixing medium or adhesive to apply onto eyes or face. This hyper-metallic product allows you to create long-wearing, multidimensional looks without the worry of fallout.
ingredients: Water, Silica, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Polyvinylpyrrolidone, Triethanolamine, Polyacrylic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Methanol, Methyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Acrylic Acid, Cyclohexane, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), May Contain/ Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Red 40 (Ci 16035), Blue 1 (Ci 42090).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-As a topper, tap on with fingers over Colorfix, Twin Flames, or your favorite powder or cream shadow (each sold separately) for a sparkling, crushed, and reflective effect. .-To wear on its own, swipe on with a flat brush for a hyper-metallic, foiled effect. ..Pro Tips: .-After applying to eyelids, make sure to keep your eyes closed until the product fully dries. This will help to keep the placement of the product where you want it and not where you donâ€™t..-Scoop out and mix different shades of Infinite Chrome Flakes together to create never-seen, personalized color combinations. .-Apply over your wing liner to spice up your everyday look.

shades.shade_descriptor: grapefruit pink with sunset yellow shift
blood orange with tuscan yellow shift
winter white with opalescent purple shift
golden amber with lapis blue shift
ocean blue with vivid amethyst shift

reviews.review_title: Tricky formula but worth the learning curve
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are incredible, I always am blown away when I use them and get a ton of compliments. I will say, the formula does have a bit of a learning curve. If you want a shadow underneath for a more opaque look, you'll need to do some testing to figure out how to apply it without rubbing off your other makeup (small, flat brush works the best for me). You also will definitely feel these on your lids no matter how dry it is - but i've never had irritation the next day. The pros speak for itself, just look at it. These look INSANE in low light, I feel like a goddess when I wear it. The color shift is also definitely noticeable after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color shift in these is truly magical! There was a bit of a learning curve for applying this formula, applying in thin layers with a small flat brush is what works best for me. Wearing more layers on the lid was a bit uncomfortable but I did get used to it. Lasted all day and came off very easily when washed. The flecks seem to dissolve in water so they did not scratch my eye, yay!
